alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 12:41PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pueblo County through 115 PM MDT... At 1240 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles south of Avondale, or 30 miles southeast of Pueblo, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Pueblo County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
